message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $999000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your life.

This is the best price I can offer, and I believe it's still a great value for the product.
